snippet.title: Minesweeper Collector 2 Release trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Minesweeper Collector 2 release August 29 on #steam! 🥳
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671210

Big minesweeper game with a storyline and a variety of minesweeper-based mechanics. Each level affects the game world and advances you through the storyline. You will discover collections, crafting, level chains, hexagons, fishing and you can even build up your own level in the editor!

Join the community:
🌐 Twitter (X):  https://x.com/MinesweeperGems
🌐 Facebook:  facebook.com/minesweeperCollector
